home.manual-description: Get up to speed quickly on how to use the app.
home.senders-description: Get control back where it belongs. See who has sent you the most number and largest size emails. Then take actions to get them out of the inbox.  Delete them or have them categorized into a label so that they stay out of the inbox.
home.subscriptions-description: View all of the email lists that you are subscribed to in one place. Unsubscribe in one easy click!

stats.title: Stats
stats.description: Statistics about the current state of your GMail inbox.
stats.subscriptions-inbox: Number of subscriptions in your inbox:

unsubscribe-dialog.title: Unsubscribe?
unsubscribe-dialog.external-link-content: This subscription involves opening a new window to unsubscribe

logout-prompt.title: Sign out
logout-prompt.content: Do you want to sign out?
